title: This might be the smallest Bluetooth speaker we’ve ever seen, and it’s under $11 on Amazon
text:
This might be the smallest Bluetooth speaker we’ve ever seen, and it’s under $11 on Amazon 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
If you’re looking for a very tiny portable Bluetooth speaker that disappears when you close your hand then do we have the speaker for you....
